summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2623, for the improvement of North 54th Street from Interlake Avenue to Woodlawn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30697 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
